title: AI Memory Agent Chat
prompt:
Title: AI Memory Agent Chat
Context: AI Agent with Memory: A futuristic, immersive chat interface featuring a memory network visualization.
Description of the screen: A modern, immersive AI chat interface titled 'AI Agent with Memory'. The background is a deep navy (#0F172A) with a dynamic teal-to-indigo gradient and faint, glowing neural network connection lines. The main chat area is a glassmorphic container with a soft glow and 20px rounded corners. User messages are gradient bubbles (#4F46E5 to indigo) with a subtle glow and a slight wave shape. AI messages have a soft translucent background with modern typography (Space Grotesk). On the right side, there's a 'Memory Nodes' panel showing small glowing dots connected by lines, representing saved context, with one node highlighted to show active memory. The input bar at the bottom is a floating glass element with a neon cyan (#22D3EE) send button and a subtle pulse animation for typing. The overall vibe is premium, dark-themed, and futuristic.
Platform: ios
Form factor: phone
